entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is described as the Junior Heavyweight Inter-School Boxing Champion of the Southeast and has become more formidable due to his involvement in boxing.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is delighted with Dudley's new talent and calls it 'the noble sport'

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is no longer afraid of his cousin Dudley but still doesn't think that Dudley learning to punch harder and more accurately is a cause for celebration.

entities.name: st. brutus's secure center for incurably criminal boys
entities.description: St. Brutus's Secure Center for Incurably Criminal Boys is mentioned as the school that Harry attends

relationships.description: Dudley has become more formidable due to his involvement in boxing.
Uncle Vernon is delighted with Dudley's new talent

relationships.entity_2: st. brutus's secure center for incurably criminal boys
relationships.description: Harry attends St. Brutus's Secure Center for Incurably Criminal Boys.
Neighborhood children are terrified of Dudley, even more so than they are of Harry.
